definition: A popular amusement park attraction consisting of a track with steep slopes, sharp turns, and sudden drops, designed to provide an exhilarating and thrilling experience for riders. It is commonly used to refer to a specific type of ride found in theme parks and is enjoyed by people of all ages.

examples.english: The roller coaster goes very fast.

examples.german: Ich liebe es, Achterbahn zu fahren.

examples.english: The roller coaster has many loops.
The roller coaster is very high.
